text: Color Me Badd is an American new jack swing, pop music and R&B; boy band that formed in 1987. The group consists of several men. It is from Oklahoma City. Their debut studio album C.M.B. was released in 1991 and featured the popular singles "Thinkin' Back", "I Wanna Sex You Up" and "Slow Motion". One of their songs was part of the soundtrack of the movie New Jack City. == Albums == * C.M.B. (1991) * Time and Chance (1993) * Now & Forever (1996) * Awakening (1998) ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website Category:1987 establishments in the United States Category:American boy bands Category:1980s American music groups Category:1990s American music groups Category:American pop music groups Category:American R&B; bands Category:Musical groups established in 1987 Category:Musical groups from Oklahoma
title: Color Me Badd
